Let f be the function given above. What are all values of a and b for which f is differentiable at  x = 1 ?
choicesHtml: a = 1 2 and b = − 1 2
a = 1 2 and b = 3 2
a = 1 2 and and b is any real number
a = b + 1 , where b is any real number
There are no such values of a and b.
